comments:
Choosing Help->Software Updates->Update Manager results in en error dialog:
"The chosen operation is not currently available".

Same problem on HP.  Neither "New Updates" nor "Update Manager" actions work.  
And perspective cannot be opened manually.

It looks fixed in I20030307 RC2 candidate.  Update manager opens, and New 
Updates action reports no updates on both AIX and HP.

I think that RC1 was probably not built correctly for these platforms because I 
didn't touch the code that now works. Could also be feature info or 
customization files for these platforms that is kept in separate files.

Closing as fixed.
